## Repo overview

## All the component and codes that is related to layout, like sidebar, headers, mobile layout etc should be placed in the folder `layout`.

## Kundali Nirman:

- all the components and code that is related to Kundali Nirman feature should be placed in the folder astro/\* folder. This code has its own layout, and sidebar. Sidebase is visible as a floating button on the bottom right corner of the screen. Main app sidebar is visible from the hamburger menu on the top left corner of the screen.

## Accounts:

- all the components and code that is related to user accounts should be placed in the folder accounts/\* folder. This code has its own layout and sidebar. Sidebase is visible as a floating button on the bottom right corner of the screen. Main app sidebar is visible from the hamburger menu on the top left corner of the screen.
